subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Kiner led the National League in home runs every year from 1946 to 1952, spent half a century broadcasting Mets games and was inducted into the Baseball Hall of Fame in 1975.
snippet: Kiner led the National League in home runs every year from 1946 to 1952, spent half a century broadcasting Mets games and was inducted into the Baseball Hall of Fame in 1975.
